content.raw:
I guess we [discussed this](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/745/visualize-moment-of-inertia-fix-203/activity#comment-662733) in pull request #745, but not sufficiently. I don't see an error message for the ground plane.

I thought it would merit an error message for people who rely on the inertia being displayed properly. The console message would tell them that it's not actually being displayed properly.

I personally prefer `gzerr` or `gzwarn`, but I would at least prefer `gzlog` rather than deleting the message entirely.

I guess we discussed this in pull request #745, but not sufficiently. I don't see an error message for the ground plane.

I thought it would merit an error message for people who rely on the inertia being displayed properly. The console message would tell them that it's not actually being displayed properly.

I personally prefer gzerr or gzwarn, but I would at least prefer gzlog rather than deleting the message entirely.
